a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Five-year breast cancer survival rates vs. GDP per capita, 2009
Share of those diagnosed with breast cancer who survive at least five years following diagnosis, versus gross
domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in constant international-$.
Data source: Allemani et al. (2015), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
